module_version.software_requirements: Lecture and tutorial for this module will be conducted in the classroom. The module will not require other special requirement.

programme_learning_outcomes.description: Explain the role of accounting in an organization and related field in every industry worldwide

Prepare full set of accounts for sole proprietorship, partnership and companies; costing and management accounting information; and assist in preparation of tax returns, audit process and finance functions.
Identify financial and non-financial information in assisting decision making process.
Develop an effective interactive skills among professional peers and subordinates.
Communicate effectively both in written and spoken form with colleague, other professionals and community.
Apply information technology for recording accounting information; and engage in life-long learning.
Demonstrate skills to identify financial information in assisting decision making process.
Develop soft-skills for self-development in terms of independent and intellectual learning for career development.
Practice managerial skills in decision making and engage in entrepreneurial activities.
Develop the exercise of professional skills and responsibilities: integrity, professional conduct (professionalism) and standards of conduct.

module_version.software_requirements: Lecture and tutorial for this module will be conducted in the classroom. The module will not require other special requirement.
module_version.synopsis: This module provides students with core concepts of the marketing function of a business in today’s business world. It introduces the marketing mix concept and elementary understanding on customer needs and behaviour in managing effectively in the global m

module.title: Integrated Business Processes with SAP ERP System

module_version.software_requirements: Windows OS machine with the latest SAP ERP software & Internet connection

programme_learning_outcomes.description: Describe accounting concepts and principles and also other reporting standards
Apply critical and evaluation skills to resolve accounting complex problem
Perform financial statements and internal reports that comply with approved standards and provide tax, audit and other accounting-related services
Perform their duties in a team and are able to solve problems associated with group work such as conflict, motivation and contribution
Relate ideas, information and arguments in a variety of forms through the presentation, to specialist and non-specialist audiences and deploy techniques of the discipline effectively.
Demonstrate competency to use various types of digital application ethically and propose data-driven solutions
Propose solutions for financial and accounting problems by using numerical techniques
Demonstrate decision-making capacities, accountabilities and leadership towards professional development and continuous improvement in knowledge acquisition to face global challenges
Integrate effectively in self-directed learning and development of a career-long attitude of continuing professional development
Perform entrepreneurial skills in assessing the national and international impact of accounting on different industries.
Demonstrate positive values, ethics and accountability with professional skepticism in engaging with society and stakeholders
